amount.label: Amount
amount.negativeETH: Can not send negative amounts of ETH.
amount.transactionError: Transaction Error. Exception thrown in contract code.

gasTotal.label: Gas Fee
gasTotal.insufficientGas: Insufficient balance for current gas total

gasLimit.label: Gas Limit
gasLimit.low: Gas limit must be at least 21000

customAddress.label: Token Address
customAddress.personal: Personal address detected. Input the token contract address.

customSymbol.label: Token Symbol
customSymbol.minlength: Symbol must be between 0 and 10 characters.
customSymbol.maxlength: Symbol must be between 0 and 10 characters.

customDecimals.label: Decimals of Precision
customDecimals.range: Decimals must be at least 0, and not over 36.

privateKey.label: Private Key String
privateKey.invalid: Something went wrong. Please make sure your private key is correct.

rpcurl.label: New RPC URL
rpcurl.prefix: URIs require the appropriate HTTP/HTTPS prefix.

seed.label: Wallet Seed
seed.placeholder:
Enter your secret twelve word phrase here to restore your vault.
Separate each word with a single space.

welcome.title:
Welcome to
 {name} {version}
welcome.description: {name} is a secure identity vault for Ethereum. It allows you to hold ether & tokens, and serves as your bridge to decentralized applications.

uniqueImage.title: Your unique account image
uniqueImage.p1: This image was programmatically generated for you by your new account number.
uniqueImage.p2: You’ll see this image everytime you need to confirm a transaction.

revealSeed.title: Seed Phrase
revealSeed.description: If you ever change browsers or move computers, you will need this seed phrase to access your accounts. Save them somewhere safe and secret.
revealSeed.revealSeedWordsWarningTitle: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone!
revealSeed.revealSeedWordsWarning: These words can be used to steal all your accounts.

importSeedPhrase.title: Import an Account with Seed Phrase

importJSONFile.title: Import an Account with JSON file

importPrivateKey.title: Import an Account with private key

backupPhrase.title: Secret Backup Phrase
backupPhrase.p1: Your secret backup phrase makes it easy to back up and restore your account.
backupPhrase.p2: WARNING: Never disclose your backup phrase. Anyone with this phrase can take your Ether forever.
backupPhrase.blocker: Click here to reveal secret words

confirmSeed.title: Confirm your Secret Backup Phrase
confirmSeed.description: Please select each phrase in order to make sure it is correct.

placeholder.addAcquiredTokens: Add the tokens you've acquired using MetaMask

confirmAddTokens.title: Add Tokens
confirmAddTokens.likeToAddTokens: Would you like to add these tokens?

logs.title: State Logs
logs.description: State logs contain your public account addresses and sent transactions.

info.title: Info
info.builtInCalifornia: MetaMask is designed and built in California.

send.onlySendTokensToAccountAddress: Only send {symbol} to an Ethereum account address.
send.onlySendToEtherAddress: Only send ETH to an Ethereum address.

signatureRequest.title: Signature Request
signatureRequest.signNotice:
Signing this message can have 
dangerous side effects. Only sign messages from 
sites you fully trust with your entire account.
 This dangerous method will be removed in a future version.

account.privateKeyWarning: Warning: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private keys can take steal any assets held in your account.

depositeEther.title: Deposit Ether
depositeEther.description: To interact with decentralized applications using MetaMask, you’ll need Ether in your wallet.
depositeEther.directDepositEtherExplainer: If you already have some Ether, the quickest way to get Ether in your new wallet by direct deposit.
depositeEther.getEtherFromFaucet: Get Ether from a faucet for the ${name}
depositeEther.buyCoinbaseExplainer: Coinbase is the world’s most popular way to buy and sell bitcoin, ethereum, and litecoin.
depositeEther.depositShapeShiftExplainer: If you own other cryptocurrencies, you can trade and deposit Ether directly into your MetaMask wallet. No Account Needed.

depositeShapeShift.depositShapeShiftExplainer: If you own other cryptocurrencies, you can trade and deposit Ether directly into your MetaMask wallet. No Account Needed.

hideToken.readdToken: You can add this token back in the future by going go to “Add token” in your accounts options menu.

resetAccount.title: Reset Account
resetAccount.description: Resetting your account will clear your transaction history.

notification.description: Your initial transaction was confirmed by the network. Click OK to go back.

shapeshift-form.depositCoin: Deposit your {depositCoin} to the address below

betweenMinAndMax: must be greater than or equal to $1 and less than or equal to $2.
copyPrivateKey: This is your private key (click to copy)
decimalsMustZerotoTen: Decimals must be at least 0, and not over 36.
defaultNetwork: The default network for Ether transactions is Main Net.
denExplainer: Your DEN is your password-encrypted storage within MetaMask.
depositBTC: Deposit your BTC to the address below:
fileImportFail: File import not working? Click here!
fromToSame: From and To address cannot be the same
gasLimitCalculation: We calculate the suggested gas limit based on network success rates.
gasPriceCalculation: We calculate the suggested gas prices based on network success rates.
greaterThanMin: must be greater than or equal to $1.
howToDeposit: How would you like to deposit Ether?

importAccountMsg.message: Imported accounts will not be associated with your originally created MetaMask account seedphrase. Learn more about imported accounts

jsonFail: Something went wrong. Please make sure your JSON file is properly formatted.
keepTrackTokens: Keep track of the tokens you’ve bought with your MetaMask account.
lessThanMax: must be less than or equal to $1.
loweCaseWords: seed words only have lowercase characters
needImportFile: You must select a file to import.
needImportPassword: You must enter a password for the selected file.
noAddressForName: No address has been set for this name.
passwordCorrect: Please make sure your password is correct.
pastePrivateKey: Paste your private key string here:
personalAddressDetected: Personal address detected. Input the token contract address.
exportPrivateKeyWarning: Export private keys at your own risk.
retryWithMoreGas: Retry with a higher gas price here
secretPhrase: Enter your secret twelve word phrase here to restore your vault.
sendTokensAnywhere: Send Tokens to anyone with an Ethereum account
spaceBetween: there can only be a space between words
symbolBetweenZeroTen: Symbol must be between 0 and 10 characters.
tokenSelection: Search for tokens or select from our list of popular tokens.
tokenWarning1: Keep track of the tokens you’ve bought with your MetaMask account. If you bought tokens using a different account, those tokens will not appear here.
troubleTokenBalances: We had trouble loading your token balances. You can view them
twelveWords:
These 12 words are the only way to restore your MetaMask accounts.
Save them somewhere safe and secret.
uiWelcomeMessage: You are now using the new Metamask UI.
usedByClients: Used by a variety of different clients
validFileImport: You must select a valid file to import.
